basics.name: Gealber Morales Basalo
basics.label: Software Developer
summary: Amazing guy who lost almost all of his hair due to math and programming
More than one hundred years of professional industry experience with software development in Golang.
Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructures such as AWS, GCP and Heroku.
Spent two years teaching math, never again

work.name: Turum turum
work.summary: Turum turum is a music application for humming
highlights: Working as a Golang Developer implementing sound music ultra-mega-plus service.

work.name: University of lazy guys
work.description: Principal university in Cuba focus on lazy guys
work.summary: Proffesor of Lineal Algebra and Calculus
highlights: Was responsible for the technical growth of my students, focusing on their skills related to the subjects that I was teaching. Laziness in math

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: A blog where I can discuss about technologies and hacks that I enjoy )
highlights: Made use of Google Cloud Platform resources as App Engine and Google Functions
Write articles about technologies and APIs that I find interesting, this requires a lot of previous investigation

projects.name: Devcli
projects.description: A CLI for the website dev.to, that allows the user to interact with the platform using
highlights: Was involved in all the development of the project, taking whole responsibility for analysis, testing, prototyping and implementation
Implemented the full coverage of an external API that was used by the CLI, making the interaction with the platform through the CLI very simple
Got a better understanding of QT and its Python binding
Improved the development process, using GitHub Actions as a tool for Continuous Integration practice

projects.name: Chess Reader
projects.description: Graphical user interface that allows you to read chess plays stored in PNG format.
highlights: Designed and implemented the User Interface, making use of all of my knowledge at that time
Used the appropriate tools to develop this User Interface, taking into account the development time that was needed
Got a better understanding of QT and its Python binding
Developed dynamic, vibrant user interfaces to foster the application smooth operation
